title: AI in Platform Engineering: Concerns Grow Alongside Advantages
author: Nicola Campagna
description: With AI, platform engineers can optimize resource allocation, identify bottlenecks and pave the way for seamless scaling with unprecedented precision and speed.
cntitle: 平台工程中的 AI：担忧与优势并存
cndescription: 借助人工智能，平台工程师可以优化资源分配，识别瓶颈，并以前所未有的精度和速度为无缝扩展铺平道路。
